title: Typo in comment in ReqExclScorer
description:
There is a typo in the last comment in ReqExclScorer. It should say: "reqTwoPhaseIterator is MORE costly than exclTwoPhaseIterator, check it last"
The patch fixes this comment.

comments.content:
Commit 824c0c2484e806a7f3c436c9b50be98b66daaaef in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/branch_6x from Adrien Grand
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=824c0c2 ]

LUCENE-7761: Fixed comment in ReqExclScorer.
